channel.title: C4d
channel.description:
Ok well this isn't the first time of me attempting to use C4d but as many people have become familer with this program on this forum i was wondering what would you suggest i read up on and if there are any great tutorials out there also im not planning on wasting this thread ill post my work here.
Edit:sorry about the wrong bored.
